page.title: 15SCOUT ACTIVITIES
page.content: The Scout Hut is near the sewage works and belongs to the 5th Devonport Scouts, of which I am a member. There are about 55 cubs and 15 scouts. I am a scout. Each year we go camping 2 or three times. Soon I will be going on a survival camp for a weekend, where I will have to live for two days and two nights with just a penknife and a sheet of polythene with which to make a bivouac to sleep in. The scouts meet between 1900 and 2100 on Friday nights. On Saturdays there is a disco at 1830. On Tuesdays between 1715 and 1830 we go swimming at HMS Drake, which is a local Naval Base on the River Tamar. On Saturday mornings we often go to Blockhouse Park to play five-a-side football. Some of the other boys belong to Boys Brigade. Girls can join Brownies or Guides or Girls Brigade.
